title: Sony Announces PlayStation Studios - Kinda Funny Games Daily 05.12.20
description:
Blessing and Imran talk about PlayStation Studios, an upcoming State of Play, a rumomred October launch for PS5 and more. 
 
Time Stamps - 
 00:02:00 - Housekeeping
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: Mohammed Mohammed, Black Jack, Al Tribesman
The Roper Report   -
00:03:00 - State of Play’s next episode is dedicated to Ghost of Tsushima
00:12:20 - Sony has announced PlayStation Studios - Christopher Dring @ GamesIndustry.biz
00:17:40 - Do you possibly see a PlayStation Studios game release on another platform? - Best Friends Q:MaDogNik96 (from Massachusetts)
00:21:15 - Could we be getting a hint at something from these two properties potentially coming with the PS5? - Best Friends Q:The Nano Biologist
00:25:28 - Is PlayStation coming in October? - Joe Skrebels @ IGN
00:28:05 - Will Xbox release at a similar time or will they release in November like usual? - Best Friends Q:William Symons
00:31:40 - Assassin’s Creed Valhalla Will Run 'at a Minimum of 30 FPS' on Xbox Series X - Jordan Oloman @ IGN
The Nano Biologist
00:43:05 - Tony Hawk’s Pro Skater is BACK BABY - Jonathon Dornbush @ IGN
00:48:10 - With Geoff saying that tomorrow will be "one of the most important events" for Summer Games Fest what do you expect to see there? What announcement would make the event a success for as much hyped as it is getting now? - Best Friends Q:Frankfurtter
00:53:00 - Arnold Schwarzenegger is coming to Predator Hunting Grounds - Jared Gerritzen, Chief Creative Officer, Illfonic @ PS Blog
00:59:28 -  HIMS
01:01:02 - Out today
 Reader mail   -
01:04:50 - Is there such a thing as revealing a game too early? - Roughfluff
01:10:25 - Squad Up: Blake(PS4) - badams289
01:10:59 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts:Greg and Tim
